titleStmt.title: The names of several persons trading in, and depending upon the manufacturing of serges within the city of Exon, and parts adjacent, lately removed from thence into the Kingdom of Ireland.
The names of several persons trading in, and depending upon the manufacturing of serges within the city of Exon, and parts adjacent, lately removed from thence into the Kingdom of Ireland.

notesStmt.note: At foot: "An account of persons gone from Tiverton for Ireland, to carry on the woolen manufacture".
Includes docket title on verso: Exeter and Tiverton Lists, &c, printed at a 90‚Å∞ angle to the rest of the text.
